response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This exceptional item carries a unique value that goes beyond its tangible features, making it an invaluable asset for those who appreciate quality and innovation. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a limited-time opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
